name: Veritas (itch) (Green Markhor)
description:
You will be playing as Asfar Khan who is a famous detective. You need to solve the case of disappearance of Dave lewis. Different  choices will give you different information, which will help you understand the story. Pay attention to the little details while playing.

A game made by Muhammad Umar

Music from www.bensound.com

Characters were made using www.charactercreator.org
